channel.title: How to make a bot
channel.description:

thnx alot rob

item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

item.title: How to make a bot
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:5, topic:2963”][quote author=robster2000 link=topic=3338.msg32272#msg32272 date=1147867672]
Dear all just wonderin wot languages,scripts wotever i wud need to make my own bot?

thnx alot
rob

[/quote]

Well first you would begin by learning to speak english.
If you do manage to learn Java it wouldn’t ever compile because you would write things such as:

oif(s == nU||) { systm.ot.PrntIn("<3"); ritrn; }[/quote]

so you printed the line <3… thats not that hard…

but still, you cant expect to wirte a java bot very easy… it take time and practice

Read full topic

just invert it

seems only color clickers and stuff are workin for rs2… stick to rsc or mess with private servers lol

item.title: How to make a bot
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

[quote=“Freddy1990, post:23, topic:2963”]To make a bot you need the following ingredients:
A community, (java) coders, lots of chips and coke, brainzzzzzz…, effort, A COMPUTER with AN INTERNET CONNECTION, POWER, A PLANET, A UNIVERSE, …, a book “how to code a bot in 1 hour”…
thats about it

EDIT: I forgot, you also need A BLENDER ;)[/quote]

Bah! I started the blender conversations. You thief. =/

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a bot
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

ironhydra:

I dont understand why people get mad at outhers because they r just typing faster then people have to be all knowledgable and pick at them with like 5 different people you guys sicken me

While I agree that clear communication is important, hydra has a point - recently some of you guys have just jumped on people who ask very simply answered questions. This one only takes one word, in fact: Java. And even if it’s a question that’s been answered a hundred times before, it only takes one person to point that out, not a page.
It sort of makes us look like a hostile community, which isn’t what we want, is it?

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a bot
item.dc:creator: @ironhydra ironhydra
item.description:

I dont understand why people get mad at outhers because they r just typing faster then people have to be all knowledgable and pick at them with like 5 different people you guys sicken me

item.title: How to make a bot
item.dc:creator: @xSignal xSignal
item.description:
@xSignal wrote:

[quote=“roll3blunts, post:20, topic:2963”][quote author=sdouble link=topic=3338.msg32449#msg32449 date=1147886500]
Well, here’s something for you to know: It would get your account banned. You use it and a week later your account is banned. If you auto with “throw away” characters and give the stuff to your main account, it also gets banned. So maybe, it’s best that you didn’t find it in time.

And about people making fun of you, use punctuation. Your threads have absolutely no punctuation and it is terribly annoying to read. Typing a certain way just because it’s faster (ie: “slang”) is an example of how lazy someone is. If they simply can’t make an extra 20 keystrokes, imagine how useless they will be when they have to work. “Oh, I didn’t secure the ladder because it’s faster to just skip that step.” “No, I did not put the addresses on the paychecks, I just dropped them in the mailbox because it’s faster.” I’m sure you get the idea.
[/quote]

wow…its not that serious.
rob i feel u bro…its better than to go “aye yo my nigga whats good” (no question mark) than to go “Dear rob, how are you doing?” not my style bro…

but anyways yea i wanted to make a bot but from the looks of it…it wont happen :([/quote]
Making a bot is serious. It’s not:

public void makeBot() { startmakingbot() } }

Read full topic

thats about it

EDIT: I forgot, you also need A BLENDER

Java, textpad, a brain, effort.

item.title: How to make a bot
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

sdouble:

If they simply can’t make an extra 20 keystrokes, imagine how useless they will be when they have to work.

Exactly. And practicing proper punctuation and grammar is good practice for coding anyway; putting an extra space or the wrong mark in your code can cause endless errors and cause hours of pointless debugging.

Read full topic

why is everyone really mean to me i can speak english and am quite good at it i just use slang because it is quicker but anyway thank you for telling me that I need to know java

because I came here yesterday to try it, but of course (just my luck!) it does not work anymore so I do not know much about it

item.title: How to make a bot

item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:8, topic:2963”]Java, textpad, a brain, effort.

The fourth one seems to be the problem for most people (myself included :S).[/quote]

I’ve been learning Java as much as I can though. My mom ordered me two more books.
